alert.note: Alert for Greenwood (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 12:38AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Greenwood County through 115 AM CDT... At 1237 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Hamilton, or 14 miles northeast of Eureka, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Virgil and Cross Timbers State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for southeastern Kansas.
